basic.Peptide Name: Neutrophil antibiotic peptide NP-4 (RatNP-4; Rodents, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus 502A (MIC=50 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ML-35, Acinetobacter calcoaceticus (MIC=50 µg/ml).Fungi:Cryptococcus neoformans (MIC=10 µg/ml), Candida albicans.
